member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadEntityFrameworkDataSource.RelatedObjects
member.summary: The names of the related entities.
member.remarks: For example, if your main entity set is called "Orders", you might want to add "OrderDetails" to this collection in case you want to get the related OrderDetails for each Order from the database.
member.value: The names of the related entities.
